item.name: Home
item.description: Hey guys, I am so thrilled, honored, tickled, and excited to share this article that was published in The Mash-Up Americans: an astonishingly refreshing publication about what it’s like to be a mash-up. Can’t think of a better way to describe my blog–The Korean Vegan. Check it out here!
